We are delighted to know about this being your 4th visit and it makes us feel so proud believing in our high standard of services.On behalf of the entire team front and the back office;I would like to say how much your kind words are appreciated by us all at the hotel.I am pleased you enjoyed all of the facilities and services including the Serenity Spa.I and we all look forward to welcome you back for another relaxing; peaceful stay soon - even if it is just to try a few more of our amazing treatments I P.S. Your words about us scoring over other hotels in Mahabaleshwar and Panchgani really made the whole team smile!Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: We had the pleasure to stay in Valley Plus rooms at Hotel Ravine during Christmas! The hotel is at a unique location just at the start of Panchgani. When we entered our room; we were awestruck by the magnificent view of the valley and the Krishna river.The room was clean and well maintained. We had a laugh when we looked at the safe deposit locker. It wasn't attached to anything and a thief could easily walk away with the entire locker.The food at the restaurant was excellent; even though it was expensive; the quantity was sufficient. The service was surprisingly good as well.The hotel is equipped with 4 tennis courts; a small swimming pool; kiddie play area; a games room and an open air restaurant. The play area for kids is really nice and our kid did enjoy his time out there...The most annoying experience about this hotel was the presence of a lot of house flies everywhere on the hotel premises; even at the kiddie play areas. It was kind of eerie and felt very unhygienic. We had never seen so many even at other locations in Panchgani. I think the hotel management should seriously take note of this issue and do something about it.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Valley plus rooms are absolutely worth it.
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer;Thank you for staying with us at Ravine and for your absolutely amazing review.We are delighted to read that you all thoroughly enjoyed your holiday especially recreational activities. We try our hardest to ensure all of our guests only receive the very best in facilities and most importantly service.On your comments about the flies;all I can say it is inevitable; though our pest controlling team continues to word hard to avoid unhygienic surroundings and maintaining the property clean on a regular basis.Thanks again for sharing your thoughts.With Kind Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: I went Panchgani in monsoon season. So everywhere was greenery. and climate was awesome with lots of rain; clouds and cold winds. and the location of the hotel is excellent and also the infrastructure is also excellent. As it was monsoon season so we already knew that we couldnt do sight seeing much because of fog. So Hotel itself should provide us the view and location. and this is the Hotel which provides awesome view with clean rooms. The service guys and receptionist were also helpful.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We are glad to know you enjoyed every bit of your stay.Your feedback gives us a sigh of relief that we were able to deliver our best. We have conveyed your positive feedback to our staff & they look forward to your next visit.Thank you once again.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: We had checked in the hotel on Dec 24 for 2 nights and 2 rooms. The hotel is good value for money. Rooms are neat and housekeeping staff is good. They can do better with the beds as they have springs in it which can be annoying at times. Overall the view is excellent and the food is good.I must say the service in the hotel restaurant is not great as there are few waiters which are running around to cater to the exisiting order....we waited for 10 mins in the morning and no one even bother to clear the tables or take orders...went to the market nearby to have the breakfast.Overall its a recommend and probably I can go again but they should sincerly look at enahncing the customer satisfaction...there is no feedback form taken or even asked for bit surprising.....I know this is peak season but a bit more curteous behaviour and small things can really enhance the experience.One more disappointment was we categorically asked if Santa would be around in the party on Dec 25 and were told yes of course..but kids were bit disappointed on not seeing one in the evening !!Overall I would give 3 stars and if there was couple of improvements probably 5 stars in next visit !!
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and thank you for your positive comments; with regards to the neat rooms and housekeeping staff. However; we are sorry to read that you were not so happy with our restaurant services and had to eat outside. Our team at Ravine takes great pride in looking after our guests and we are disappointed that on this occasion; our high standard of service was not met.Regarding the feedback form please note we do have comment cards that are duly filled and as mentioned by you Yes; due to the peak season our staff was over occupied and couldn’t get those filled. We apologize for this human error. Thank you once again for all your constructive comments.We look forward on welcoming you back soon; where we will ensure prompt service to you without taking much time and award us with full marks! Best Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: The beauty if the view from the room during the monsoons is wonderful. Food is good. Worth staying. But u need to choose ur room wisely for the view. View from restaurant is also fantastic. U feel as though u r in the sky. Great place to visit specially during the monsoons
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer;Thank you for taking the time for sharing your overall experience with us.We are delighted that you enjoyed all of our facilities and services.I hope it won't be as long till your next visit!Wish to welcome you soon again.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: Its all about location when it comes to ravine. Beautiful views of the valley. The hotels property is also great alongwith with tennis courts; swimming pool; sports room and spa. Food is awesome. There is ample parking space for your car. The staff is helpfull and cheerfull. They arranged cake at midnight for my wife's birthday. Overall it was a wonderfull experience while staying at this hotel. Will surely visit again and again.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for staying with us to celebrate your wife's 'Special' birthday & for your kind words.We are pleased that you enjoyed the location of the hotel and all of the service and facilities that we are all so very proud of.It is so nice of you to thank us; you are welcomed - we just wish all our guests were as lovely as you!We look forward to welcome you back soon; perhaps for your next special occasion.. We will get the bubbly on ice ready!With kind regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Title: “View gardens Tennis is all this hotel offer”
Review_Content: The first big thing when you enter Panchgani is Ravine. It is one of the biggest hotel on the main highway. The USP of this place is its locations bang on the Highway . Have stayed lot of time in this property for one simple reason location and accessibility.Other then this it is a basics simple hotel which offers very good rooms with basics amenities which are not renovated from ages.There is a very good play area for kids of all ages which I havent seen in any hotels of that category. There are plenty of tennis court with scenic view of the valley and river.The swimming pool is there but not there . As it is very small and fit only for a dip.Some suggestions for the hotel:--You have the best location in Mahableshwar PanchanganiIF you add some feature like a game room and maybe add a heated swimmming pool you would be one star above all.Food can be improved with little more varieties.IF you have noticed as a regular who have stayed at ravine; people use your place as lodging more then enjoying everythin in house.
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer;Thank you for taking the time to leave your positive feedback following your recent stay at Ravine.We have noted your comments regarding refurbishment & will pass this on to the management.At Ravine we are always working on improving all aspects of Hospitality and your comments will definitely be seriously considered. The swimming pool is temperature controlled but due to the Winter months and shorter days …the water can still be a bit chilly. Thanks again for all your suggestions and sharing your thoughts.Kind regardsAnish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: Had stayed here for 04 nights in valley plus room. The view from the room was breathtaking and the best one could get in Panchgani. The rooms are nice and clean with all the basic amenities one would need for a relaxing vacation. The hotel had lot of indoor activities such as a mini movie theater; swimming pool; snooker etc. The hotel service was very good and the staff was very attentive. Thanks to Vaishali who went an extra mile to get us the movies we wanted to watch in the movie theater. The outdoor garden and the valley facing verandah is the best part of the hotel. A must recommend for all looking for a relaxing rejuvenating holiday.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Valley facing rooms are best
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer;Thank you for staying with us at Ravine and for sharing your absolutely amazing review.We are delighted to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your holiday especially recreational activities. We all love what we do and it makes us so proud when our lovely guests (like you!) say such wonderful things about us.Vaishali has thanked you for the special mention.I hope it won't be as long till your next visit! Thanks for the recommendation.Kind regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: The hotel is built on amazing location with a valley view from one side and river view from another. The rooms are not less than a 5 star and has great amenities. The food is excellent. One can play tennis on the mountain...yes the hotel has a tennis court on the hill... Totally amazing! Get a spa massage or relax in the garden in eve...very nice ambience and great food. All in all perfect for a romantic get away or exclusive family time :)
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank for posting such a lovely review about our hotel on Trip Advisor.We are over whelmed reading your overall experience at our place. It gives us a sigh of relief; that we are able to deliver our best in all ways as per your expectation.We wish to host you soon again.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Title: “Rich experience along with cozy & peaceful atmosphere”
Review_Content: We stayed for 2 days in Panchgani in November13 at Ravine Hotel; due to off-season the rates were 50% & we enjoyed the stay like never before. The amenities in hotels are so far ahead than any other three star hotel I have seen like Gym;Swimming pool;Art Gallery;Game Zone;Tennis courts etc..Vally view plus rooms are my choice were awesome. Bathtubs was only available to executive rooms for 4 persons.We seen some cottages at backside area but needs some improvement & Although taste was very nice at restaurant but variety in Menu should be there-that's only my suggestion..Overall an excellent stay & pleasant experience.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Go for Vally plus rooms..you can have awsome vally views from room only & bathtubs are availabl...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for posting such a lovely review about our hotel. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and also found the hotels location to be an advantage! Your helpful opinions are always welcomed as we endeavour to enhance our services towards our Guests. We would be glad to assist you with your next booking soon! Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: I went to Panchgani in October with my family and relatives and stayed at Hotel Ravine that was recommended by a family friend. The booking people suggested we go in for the Junior Executive rooms and that was a good choice. The Pros:The rooms are nice and spacious. The hotel property is really beautiful. Nice gardens and tennis courts. The food at the restaurant is good. The staff at the reception and the housekeeping is very good. They helped us with any issues. Sydney point is right next to the hotel.Overall; we enjoyed our stay at this hotel.The Cons:Instead of an extra bed; they had this sofa that can be used as an bed. It wasn't the most comfy spot but we managed. No breakfast buffet..If they included a breakfast buffet that would be really nice. Wifi connectivity could be better.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are obliged to have you stay with us. We value the feedback of our guests; and we appreciate your overall good review about our property; we will take into account a few of the short comings pointed out by you and get them worked out.Please note that we do have a buffet option for corporate or big groups if needed! We are look forward to welcoming you soon again.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: Well; We were 5 of us staying at the ravine in the month of November. We had prebooked the Ground Floor Premium room and the day we entered the hotel we get to know that we have been given the GROUND FLOOR ROOM instead of the premium one . The manager Quarreled a lot and tried his best to force us to take the normal room instead of the premium so that he could make some good bucks by selling the premium room to someone else at a very high place but that didnt happen because we were about to call the police. From the next day everything was going great; The hotel has an amazing view and a very friendly staff. Also; the hotel was clean and well maintained but from the second day we faced few problems-- The room service was very slow; We got Cracked Glasses; They never cleaned the glasses well. The extra bed was broken but no action was taken.Overall an Amazing place to stay at a reasonable price but the Hotel MANAGER Is a Greedy Diplomatic Person and might ruin the hotel's reputation. I dont remember his name but we called that guy a \Crazy Madrasi\"."
Room_Tips: Room Tip: If you are a couple then you should not miss the \VALLEY PLUS\" Room and if you friends are..."
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you posting your review on Trip Advisor.We regret that you had a problem with our Manager. It has been taken up to the higher authority & steps are been taken to improvise on the same.On this; all we can say; is that; it was one of those unfortunate days for Ravine; where so many things went off-track at the same time; and we could not serve you our best. We are overjoyed reading your wonderful experience at our hotel. Also satisfied; that we delivered our best in all ways to make your stay the way you want it to be.Hopefully on your next visit; we will make sure your stay is complaint free.We look forward to your next visit.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: I went to panchgani in July and it was rainy season and the location and the hospitality of the hotel was heavenly beautiful and admirable. Food was also good and not so costly. Overall it was the experience of my lifetime.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Choose Valley View Rooms. Amazing View.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for taking the time to write such a kind review. We all love what we do and it makes us so proud when our lovely guests (like you!) say such wonderful things about us.We look forward to host you back in the very near future.With Kind Regards;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: I stayed at the hotel with family in Duplex room and had a very good time.The room was very spacious and clean. The food at the inhouse restaurant \The Melting Pot\" was excellent. The hotel is centrally located and the view of the valley from the hotel was excellent."
Room_Tips: Room Tip: The climate is cool so you do not need AC specially if you are going at this time of the year.
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer;Thank you for taking the time for sharing your overall experience with us.We are delighted that you enjoyed all of our facilities and services. I hope it won’t be as long till your next visit!Wish to welcome you soon again.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: A few words to describe Hotel Ravine. \Mixed Experience\". Great Location; Overlooks a beautiful valley and a very still waterbody ( River) . Look Up and you see sydney point. Property is located at an excellent position. Rooms are neat clean and spacious. Beds are comfortable They have rooms that overlook the valley; excellent view (Ask for vallye view rooms ) . Upkeep of property is just about ok. A lot more can be done to make it better. They have a few tennis court ; you may see some good games also happening. They have a great place for a sit out overlooking the valley and river. From here you can see the sun set behind the mountaints..Its an excellent view and you can spend atleast an hour just sitting there. They also have a kids play area; where small kids will have a great time for sure.. The entire hotel has a DG backup for power failure situations;; so that's not a worry. That is where the best part ends. The restaurant they have creates a very bad experience. Bad is an understatement. They serve al - a - carte and many items have a good 30 minute wait. This is the first restaurant where you walk in for breakfast and the first thing they tell you; please raise your full breakfast requirement at once; we will take some time to serve. Even breakfast items have a 30 minute wait Whew!!! .They know how to spoil your mood in the morning. The quality of what they serve is also not great.. You can seriously seriosuly give a pass to their restaurant; if You have a vehicle go out and eat.. Dont bother to eat here... The restaurant pricing is at par with what you would pay at other 3/4 Star Hotels .. The rest of the experience is great... So I would personally recommend this property to those who want to stay a great property but will always always eat out..."
Room_Tips: Room Tip: I choose the valley plus room and it offered a great view
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer; Thank you for taking the time to post your comments; your positive is much appreciated by the team.We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay especially the neat clean and spacious rooms.Furthermore; I apologize that your breakfast experience was below par. I have discussed your comments with my Restaurant Manager who will be reviewing procedures. We would also like to inform you we do compare our prices regularly with our local competitive set and feel that we are well priced. We look forward to welcoming you back soon; where we will ensure you are provided with a quick ‘Generous’ breakfast and award us with full marks!Thanks again for your comments and recommendations.With Kind Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: I and my Family stayed at this Hotel in 2012 and it was indeed a memorable stay. I have a daughter who has mild Autism and we had mentioned this to the Hotel at the time of reserving the rooms. The Management went out of their way to make us comfortable and ensure we got the best treatment and support. The Room service was excellent and although we could not get the corner duplex rooms with the balcony; the neighbouring rooms were still very nice and my family is now asking us when we are going back! The only drawback but not a big concern was that the pool is not heated especially in the winter but then i guess it is a bit too much to ask for!
Room_Tips: Room Tip: If you have a family take the duplex rooms on the ground floor with the balcony as they have a nice...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We are glad to know you enjoyed every bit of your stay.Your feedback gives us a sigh of relief that we were able to deliver our best. We have conveyed your positive feedback to our staff & they look forward to your next visit.On your next holiday; we will definitely reserve the room of your choice.Wish to host you soon again.Kind Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Title: “Hotel with awesome view and good for family and friends”
Review_Content: A good hotel to stay - rooms are plenty and at reasonable rates- depending on the view you enjoy. Also good for a family as it has in-built two beds at different levels in the same room. A lot of activities and facilities for everyone in the family to enjoy and feel on a holiday- swimming pool; tennis courts; play room with carom; table tennis; pool and much more
Room_Tips: Room Tip: select a room which has a view of the Ravines... its just awesome to see to the sunset in the evenin...
Response_to_Review: Dear Reviewer;Thank you for staying with us at Ravine and for your absolutely amazing review.We are delighted to read that you all thoroughly enjoyed your holiday especially recreational activities. We try our hardest to ensure all of our guests only receive the very best in facilities and most importantly service.Please do come back and stay with us again in the near future.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Title: “We gate crashed here and were pleasantly surprised !”
Review_Content: Due to our last minute check in; we had a reception view room in the ground floor; apart from that we enjoyed the stay - clean rooms; timely service; good property with fantastic views and places to walk around. Had a nice play area for kids and a magic show the night of our stay. The food could be better; especially that they should consider a breakfast buffet. We made a short trek to Sydney point from the hotel as a family and it was nice being the only ones there in an otherwise crowded site.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; We are really glad to read that you were satisfied with our service and that you had a nice time. It was a pleasure for us having you as our guest! We look forward to welcoming you back to us soon.Warm Regards;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: I stayed with my family on 6th & 7th November'2013. This hotel has got all the positives such as location; very good property; very good rooms but their front desk staff needs training to be more customer friendly. All good quality of the hotel are overshadowed to negativity by their arrogant attitude. Their feeling is that irrespective of their behavior customers will be there because of location but in long term it may not be true
Room_Tips: Room Tip: We stayed in room No. 217 which is not properly sealed so all the exhaust smell of kitchen is unbea...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback following your recent stay. We are glad you loved our property and the location. As mentioned by u in regards to the front desk staff; I can assure you this is not a common occurrence and on your next visit we would be delighted to show you how ‘Courteous & Cordial’ our front desk staff over here is.We look forward to welcome you back soon.With Kind RegardsAnish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: A place which can fit both couples and extended families; its located at the start of Panchgani and offers excellent views of the valley. Resort is clean and offers a playing room; gym; dining room; swimming pool and accessibility to Mahableshwar (~ 45 min drive).The resort has many tennis Courts (though we couldnt play given the monsoon season) and a viewing deck. We stayed in a duplex room (which had access to an exclusive balcony) and had an excellent experience when the clouds entered inside our rooms with chilly winds.Only negative for us were the toilets which were not well ventilated (hotel staff indicated they had a centralised duct; which in our opinion was not effective enough).
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Rooms on higher floors. Though our Gr floor room had an attached terrace.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for staying with us at Ravine.We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.It is wonderful to be appreciated and the way you have described your Ravine Experience’ is exactly what we aspire to achieve every day. Please do come back and stay with us again in the near future.Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: Ravine is my usual choice in panchgani. View form the hotel and the rooms is the best part of the hotel. Melting Pot restaurant serves excellent food with a breathtaking view. Rooms are quite good and clean. Parking is though not sufficient but serves the purpose. friendly and helpful staff with affordable tariff makes Ravine a perfect weekend getaway.Dont be surprised if you bump into any Bollywood personality at the hotel; coz i did!
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We thank you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Ravine. We value the feedback of our guests; and we appreciate your overall good review about our property.We look forward to presence back at Ravine.Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Title: “Amazing Resort: Need to Improve Food Quality”
Review_Content: I visit this resort 2 days back; it was a wonderful experience; The view from the room was fantastic; customer service is good and very helpful (infact very quick). They may however look at the quality/Taste of food served at \Melting Pot\". This taste of the food is nowhere matching the amount they are chagrining. I was infact disappointed the first time i visited the restaurant. Also; please carry insect repellent; as lots of insects will enter the room once the windows are open. which is a buster; coz u cant enjoy the evening that way."
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Please please please improve the quality.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Many thanks for posting your review about our hotel on Trip Advisor.We are glad to know; you had a wonderful experience staying at our property & you also enjoyed the fantastic valley views from our rooms. We always try to give the best of our services to our esteemed guests & hope to continue with the same!Sorry to hear; about your not so good experience with our food. We have taken steps to improve the same & assure you on your next visit; you won’t have any complaints regarding room service.Thank you once again for reviewing our hotel.Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: always stay here when ever iam in panchgini or mahableshwar. excellent service location and staff.view from the valley side rooms is awesome.. food is little costly but tasty..children play area is also very gud and safe ..
Room_Tips: Room Tip: any room on valley side is the best
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for your appreciative comments on Trip Advisor!We are delighted; whenever you come to Panchgani you choose Ravine for your stay. Your positive comments; motivates us to give our best. We hope to host you soon again! Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: We were looking for a relaxing long weekend amidst the nature in Panchgani and we were not disappointed by Hotel Ravine; Panchgani. Located at the Sydney point; it is just next tJro the Panchgani toll and conveniently located. We had made advance reservations online about a month before our visit; as we heard the hotel is often overbooked.The experience in Jr. Executive room was amazing mainly because of the stunning views and a rustic vintage decor. The only problem with full open glass windows is a little loss of privacy; but who cares when you can wake up to such a beautiful view! We had booked 220 which is at the end and hence have two side open views. However; coming to the flip side I don't understand why the bathing area is so unbelievably small? Food is good as well and you can eat there for 2 days without getting bored :)The experience at Spa was also really good.Recommended for stunning views and unique experience of Jr. Executive / Executive rooms.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Choose the Executive rooms for a family (2 bedrooms) or a Jr. Executive room (for couple) to enjoy t...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We are overjoyed reading your wonderful experience at our hotel. Also satisfied; that we delivered our best in all ways to make your stay the way you want it to be.The full open glass is to give the mesmerising view of the valleys which makes your stay cheerful & memorable. Overall; you enjoyed the views; our restaurant food & the spa; gives us a sigh of relief that we gave a reason for you to come back to us again for another relaxing weekend.Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “Excellent in all aspects; value for money!”
Review_Content: Located at Sydney Point in Panchgani; this Hotel has it all. From large garden to beautiful swimming pool to roons with awesome view...its got all that you would want! Its a 3 star properyy & yoh dont need to go outvof the hotel premises except for sight seeing.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Valley Plus rooms are very good option; one can even have a look at the junior executive rooms.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for your wonderful reviews and your positive feedback motivates us to serve our customers even better; we strive to be not just good; but the best. Do plan your trip soon & let us know about it as we would be more than happy to welcome you back again.Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “Loved the hotel but not the hidden charges”
Review_Content: There is very little to not like about the property. Fab location; well-appointed rooms and suite; loads of things to keep the kids busy with and very attentive staff. The food was also quite good. Our only grouse was the steep tax - 17 per cent. They take you through the tariff structure; telling you how they are giving you a 30 per cent discount and then say you have to pay a 17 per cent tax. Besides; the tariff they charge you on paper for AC rooms is actually not what is printed on paper. They tell you that IF you switch on the AC; you have to pay 1200 bucks more. C'mon! For all the flair and the efficiency of the property; this is so not happening!
Room_Tips: Room Tip: If you are travelling as family; ask for a suite and request for a discounted rate.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We are happy to know; you loved our hotel; and thank you for the fabulous comments.Regarding the taxes; unfortunately we cannot avoid those fees. We would like to clarify there are No Hidden Charges charged from our end; those are the Govt taxes which are mandatory for which proper bills are been provided; due to frequently changing Tax rates and regulations the taxes are accounted separately. Due to the great weather thru out the year the AC’s are infrequently used in place like Panchgani. We do charge extra for it only when used. Hope to see you soon again at Ravine!Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Title: “Ravine - amazing place to find the piece”
Review_Content: I like this place a lot... i come from europe and my trip to india was realy spiritual for me and amazing. Ravine is really nice hotel with beautiful view; nice spa; beauty salon. Indian food is really nice there; when its about europan - they have to work on it;)But over all is really fantastic. I got to me the owners and they are such nice people. Panchgani has some nice places; mostly to relax and find yourself.Hotel is kids-friendly
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;It’s indeed pleasure to have you stay with us. We admire you visiting us from Europe & coming all over here to Panchgani.Reading such lovely reviews enhance us to give our best services to you & our other guests.Our boss was blissful to meet you! He sends you his best wishes & gaze to see you soon again at Ravine!Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: Ravine is ideally located; short drive to Panchgani city centre. Despite being there in monsoon; we found the hotel surprisingly full and as a result lobby was typically crowded. Rooms are nice and comfortable but a bit basic and maintenance could be much better. Views from the rooms facing the valley are very nice though it was a bit obstructed due to some maintenance work going on the hotel. Service tends to be not very helpful in case of any special needs but very prompt for regular requests.There is ample parking space for those who are driving down.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for posting your review on Trip Advisor.As you can read from the other reviews; we are mostly occupied due to our Hotel’s growing popularity amongst all & the kind of hospitality we provide to our esteemed guests! Generally weekdays are the best time to visit if you are looking for a peace and quite stay; as Panchgani is a Boarding School town and we have a lot of School parents visit on the Exite weekends. Yes; due to cleaning & maintenance work that we preform after the long rains ; you couldn’t get the pleasure of seeing the beautiful valley across our windows; which directly opens up towards the mountains.  We assure you everything would be at a par on your next visit.Do plan your trip soon & let us know about it.Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel.

Review_Content: We arrived late in the evening to Hotel Ravine; they gave us great rates and showed us two rooms one of which had a giant window overlooking the tennis courts and the valley. The room we selected was spacious; had decent interiors and a GREAT bath. There was a plenty of room for 5 people. Room service was prompt and polite and though the hotel has quite an eclectic decor; the service is top notch. Hate to say this but the restaurant; has a lot to improve on: The choice of food is limited; the service is starkly different from the room service and the food is a little pricey. Must mention this: We left a scarf in our room after we checked out and the hotel staff called us on our mobile to inform us. She offered to keep the scarf until our next visit. This is one reason why I would reccomend this hotel above any other place in Panchgani. We strongly recommend this place. It is located slightly outside of the Panchgani town ; but if you arrive by your own vehicle it will give you a chance to see the scenic valley and enjoy the lovely drive a bit more :)
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Room 301 was rather cramped and did not have a window. But 306 was beautiful and was only moderately...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;It gives us great pleasure to read your wonderful review and to know that you have enjoyed every bit of your stay in our hotel.We are indeed overwhelmed with your response towards our service and would like to specially thank you for your recommendation. We also ensure to improve the quality of breakfast and its value for money. Looking forward for you to visit us again!Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: family of 4 adults and 1 child Stayed in GF Premium duplex ; 18th Sept for dads birthdayWe loved : The location... overlooking the valleySmiling staff at reception and a smooth early chk in the room was huge and tastefully donedecently pricedearly morning chk out was equally smooth dining area overlooked the cloudssome construction was on outside the room and the staff ensured we knew about it before booking the room. We still chose this room. Needs improvement : The tv remote did not work; sink was leaking and it took multiple visits by a confused lady to understand the problem. Finally it was fixed by an electrician and plumber respectivelywhile the room was great.... maintenance did not seem to be a priority - the curtains were dirty Water came in through the door as it was raining harddoor mats outside the bathrooms were dirtythe games room will benefit with ACs - it was very stuffyAll said and done ; I will definitely return.We stayed only 1 night so cannot comment on other facilities; We had 1 meal there and it was unremarkable.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: if you want a duplex - go for duplex premium only.......... the regular duplex on ground floor are w...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Many thanks for sharing your experience & choosing Ravine for your recent stay. We are obliged to have esteemed Guest like you to stay with us. We value the feedback of our guests; and appreciate your overall good review about our property. We will take into account a few of the short comings pointed out by you; and try to get them resolved. On your next visit; we assure you that your stay will be free of complaints. We would be glad to assist you with your next booking soon.Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Title: “Hopeless! Unhygienic rooms with a \We don't care\" type of attitude from the Management.”"
Review_Content: Had been to this place before was better then but thats it! Am never coming back here...Here's why? We booked & payed for our stay online for Valley Plus room 5 days in prior. It was informed that we will receive the confirmation for the reciept of payment with 24 hrs; however we didn't get any confirmation. So we call up the place to ask wether they had received the payment? They said \yes\" a day prior to our stay but also informed that Valley Plus rooms have been given to someone else (no more explanation given). So they gave us Valley side on our arrival which was still ok until we got into the room where it was stinking pretty bad. (We were told it was some toilet leakage & was irreparable) So had to pay extra for the Junior executive suite. The hotel management was totally indifferent to the situation but the bell buys & room service staff was surprisingly helpful. The in house hotel restaurant was a sad story again. If anyone from Ravine is reading this pls note n make necessary changes."
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thanks for writing very truthful review. We regret that your stay was not everything that you expected. We tried calling on your contact info mentioned to discuss about it; unfortunately couldn’t connect with you.I would like to mention here that; I had a personal check on our online reservation system regarding your booking; It seems; you had done the booking on the 16th of September; 2 days prior to your arrival. Also; we had mailed you back stating that Valley Plus rooms were not available & hence confirmed you Valley Side rooms; Even official confirmation was been sent to you on the 17th of September by our staff. I would like to clarify further more that; we were totally reserved for the valley plus rooms on your arrival day; and hence we were unable to fulfil your requirement. On this; all we can say is that; it was one of those unfortunate days for Ravine; where things went off-track at the same time; and we could not serve you our best. We regret that you had a problem while staying at our hotel and assure you it will not be repeated.Kindly provide us an opportunity once again to show you; how warm our hotel management staff over here is; and your next visit would certainly be complain free for sure. Hope to see you back again @ Ravine!Best wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: The valley view rooms in this hotel are simply outstanding. I dont think any other resort in any other hill station wud be able to compete with them. The food though is expensive and the taste is also average. Other than that; an excellent place to relax amidst the beauty of nature
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; Thank you for your feedback and we are happy to hear that you have listed us as the best property not only in Panchgani; but also amongst the other hill stations. We will take steps to improve the quality of food and it’s value for money.It was a pleasure having you stay with us and we look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you back again!! Best wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: Certainly has a great view; cant complain of the service - the staff is frendly and helpful. A lot of polace for kids to run around; and on good weather days good facilities to use. However the rooms need a serious make over. The restaurant is highly overrated ( perhaps because there are so few good places in Panchgani).
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Many thanks for sharing your experience. We appreciate your positive comments towards our staff. We value the feedback of our guests; and we appreciate your overall good review about our property.We look forward to presence back at Ravine.Best wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: I and my wife went to relax for a weekend at this place and we took a valley plus room. the room is basic but neat and clean. i feel though the size of the bed is comparatively small but it is high on comfort level. the bathroom is basic too but has continuous flow of hot water. as soon as you open the curtains of your room; the remark is wow..the view is wonderful; it just makes you feel so relaxed and peaceful. the check-in and the check-out at the reception were smooth. there is ample parking space; 4 tennis courts; beautiful swimming pool and a podium sitting area with a view to die for.now i come to some negatives of this hotel.1. the restaurant serves good food; but the service isnt prompt. we had to search for waiters as they all use to assemble in one area and do chitchat. no one was attentive. Secondly as we are pure veggies the smell in the restaurant was not welcoming.2. the restaurant serves south indian food for a limited time; but i suggest that they should serve it all day as it was brilliant.3. the spa was a total rip off for us. i and my wife did a back massage and both of us experienced severe pain on our back on the next day. so i would suggest better avoid the spa here.rest everything was upto the mark. would definitely stay at this hotel whenever i am back in panchgini.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Choose the valley plus rooms for best views. rooms on 2nd floor give better views.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We thank you for your detailed review about our property & also appreciate the overall rating given by you! Your feedback is welcomed & we will take a note of all the drawbacks mentioned by you. We are constantly striving to give our best to our guests!On your next visit you will definitely see the improvement in our facilities. We once again thank you for your useful suggestions!Hope to see you again in the future.Best wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “A hotel with a view... It has to be Ravine”
Review_Content: I can truly say that this hotel has the best location in Panchgani. Amazing view for the rooms facing the valley. We stayed in the Executive room and had another 2 rooms on the east side which I can say had everything for a perfect holiday. The kids loved it and there was nothing to complain about. The receptionist Sushma was very helpful and had frank opinions about our requirement and was very helpful. She is the star at the desk and very helpful. Working in the travel and tourism industry it was a surprise to hear that they charge extra if you need the A/C. This was something new.The game room needs some improvement. The food was excellent and room service was good.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Cars from outside the state of Maharashtra need to pay a fee to visit Panchgani. Kindly keep the rec...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for posting such a lovely review about our hotel. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and also found the hotels location to be an advantage! Your helpful opinions are always welcomed as we endeavour to enhance our services towards our Guests. We will convey your encouraging reply to our staff Sushma. We would be glad to assist you with your next booking soon! Best WishesAnish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: Let me start with the -ve 's; the hotel does not have an fool proof booking system ;got no confirmation on booking from the hotel on email in spite of constant reminders by phone not a pleasant first interaction with hotel .But that was that and my complete mind set changed on reaching the hotel .1) The hotel had upgraded me to valley facing room on arrival (u have to only stay at valley facing /valley plus rooms)2) Reception staff was genuine in suggestions ...specially vaishali 3) The best room service I have ever experienced ..better than lot of 5 stars .everything is quick and prompt4)good restaurant ;little over priced though 5) view to die for All in all I would definitely recommend this one but would advice changes in booking procedure ..especially the confirmations which are never mailed in spite of the staff assurances
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; Thank you for your sincere review on our hotel. Sorry to hear about your experience on our booking system. At Ravine; we are actively working to improve on all aspects of hospitality. We are glad to know your stay was everything that you expected & were astounded about the hotel’s view. Thanks for your recommendations once again. We look forward to welcoming you back again.Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: After having driven on the Panchgani - Mahabaleshwar route extensively; i believe no hotel has a better location than Ravine...Though we managed a east side room (without the valley view); we were pleasantly surprised by the grandeur of the room which compensated the lack of view. In any case when u r staying outdoors on short trip; u dont mind having the view from ur room....The hotel is beaut
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for your wonderful reviews and your positive feedback motivates us to serve our customers even better; we strive to be not just good; but the best.We hope you will return soon and in the meantime we send our best regards! Ravine Hotel;Anish K.

Review_Title: “Great Hotel Good Location recommended for family”
Review_Content: Good hotel Some things were strange A/C EXTRA Charge That's something new to me Bought executive room That's 2 rooms with 4 adults Good view from the room Quiet place CleanThey gave free water on arrival on 1st day I asked them to give packed water on 2nd day they didn't I told them its new day started so everything goes new But they didn't Otherwise good
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for your frank opinion about our hotel.We are happy to hear that you liked our hotel & also loved the view from the room. Regarding mineral water it is served complimentary on the day of arrival.Yes; we are charging extra for AC as it a seldom to use in place like Panchgani. Hope to see you again!Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: it made my trip even more special a good welcome perfect arrangements n authentic taste of food n location is awsome valley view is like heavenly experience morning welcome by clouds n echo of cool winds evening in scenery of fog lights n lamps in valleyenjoyed the hide n seek game of clouds n clear weather n whn u see krishna river bank wth lights of houses situated downwards its like dream come trueawsomeeeeeeeeeeethe only problem is mirror was not clear n construction noise
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Rooms on the valley side give you a good view
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you so much for your positive reviews towards our hotel.We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay at our hotel & found the hotel’s location to be an advantage.We are consistently trying to deliver our best to our esteemed guests.We look forward to see you again for another mesmerising experience at our hotel.Best Wishes;ANISH KRavine Hotel

Review_Content: This is one place which has given me lots of mixed feeling about the place ; so let me be mathematical about it.the pro's and greats of the hotel:-+)great location+)actually rightly called the palace of the winds wonderful sound of the winds almost al 24 hrs; giving a mystic feeling. (though some may find it spooky)+)dinchak /jazzy chandeliers and decor+)great mesmerising view from the restaurant+)great view from most rooms+)good food ; some may find it average but we liked it +) my fav. lavazza coffee is available now the con's/-) sevice is a lill brusk to our sensibilites-) bussiness like attitude of staff ; though couple of them kartik and the other fellow from mizoram were good-)extra charge for ac use Rs 600 i was told was strange-)we were charged peak season tarriff when occupancy was low was strange-) extra Rs 20 charge for air hockey game was kind of unheard of -)foul smell emanating from some parts of hotel was strangebut place definitely warrants a visit ; for the charm of the place especially in monsoon.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: jr executive rooms are good
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Many thanks for sharing your experience. We value the feedback of our guests; and we appreciate your overall good review about our property!We will take into account a few of the short comings pointed out by you and will take steps to ensure that you don’t face issues like the ones mentioned. It was a pleasure for us having you as our guest! We are looking forward to welcoming you soon again!Best Wishes;ANISH K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: Let me just start by saying that the location of this hotel is spot on and the views that it commands of the valley is mesmerizing. The place is windy every time of the day. I'd recommend you visit only for the view only. The Hotel is well maintained and great too. The rooms with the views of the valleys are the best. Service is great and quick. Food is delicious though repetitive. Rooms have all the amenities and well kept and are not particularly luxurious but great nonetheless. There is a swimming pool too but it was not well maintained; so that was a dissapointment. Wifi is not completely free and is too slow. Sydney point is located just at 10 minutes walk from the hotel and has amazing views. I absolutely recommend this hotel for a fun weekend getaway with your family; you won't be disappointed.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; We are indeed overwhelmed with your response towards our service and would like to specially thank you for your recommendation. Yes; many rooms in our Hotel do have a breathtaking view of the Hills & Valleys. Your helpful opinions are always welcomed as we endeavour to enhance our services towards our Guests. We look forward to welcome you back again soon for another mesmerising experience during the winter.Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: I visited these hotel couple of times the view from its Valley Plus room is excellent and no better view you can get in whole Mahableshwar or Panchgani. Food is good. Facilities in the hotel is also good.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: If you are nature friendly go and stay only in Valley Plus rooms..
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for your positive review. We are indeed glad with your response towards our service. We await for your visit to us again.Best Wishes;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “Amazing views of valley and prices are really reasonable”
Review_Content: The hotel has very nice views of valley specially from Valley View room and restaurant. Also on the panchgini-mahabaleshwar road.The hotel has lots of amenities to enjoy like 4 Lawn tennis courts (1 just close to valley); movie theater; games room; gym; swimming pool and spa.The best weather to go to the hotel is summer and the hotel have tents close to the valley.Prices of food at the hotel is reasonable.Hotel staff is friendly and co-operative.Room services are good.Needs to improve some things:1. Tea/coffee maker was missing.2. Bathroom kits and toiletries needs to improve.3. Hotel can include buffet options also.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for the splendid review. Yes our valley facing rooms do have a breath-taking view which leaves one stunned. Please note that we do have a buffet option for corporate or big groups if needed! Hope to host you soon again!Best Wishes;Anish KRavine Hotel.

Review_Content: We had booked room for 2 days. There was continuous rain and heavy winds so could not roam outside much. The hotel is nice 3 star kind of. Service is quick; staff are professional. Food quality is very good however bit expensive. Atleast they should reduce the price of Tea. Otherwise every thing perfect. Location bit far from market 1.5 km but that's fine. Also hotel view itself is a point so you can have a nice view from hotel only. We took valley side room and the view was superb. If there no rains then u can enjoy very much within hotel premises. Overall good experience.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for writing a marvellous review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your overall experience. It is reviews like these which revitalizes and enlivens us! At Ravine; we constantly strive to deliver the best we can. We look forward to welcome you back again in the coming season (winters); where you would be astounded to see the real beauty of Panchgani.Best Regards;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: We stayed in this hotel for two nights and three days. The rooms were very clean; the staff was very helpful & the view from the rooms was mind-blowing. It has full valley view or partial valley view depending upon the type of room you select. The place is calm with beautiful green surroundings. It’s very well maintained with very good interiors. The restaurant in there serves good quality and tasty food. Overall experience was more than satisfactory. I will definitely stay here next time. It’s a perfect place for a comfortable stay & definitely recommended.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Valley view rooms are definitely recommended
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; Thank you for your splendid review. We are indeed overwhelmed with your response towards our service and would like to specially thank you for your recommendation to not only visit Ravine; but to also explore the ravines of Panchgani. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcome you back again for another mesmerizing experience during the winters.Best Regards;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “Nice property; but had to fight for the room we paid for.”
Review_Content: This would have easily been a 4 rating but for one fact. Although we had booked the junior exec room; we were initially given the second bedroom of the executive room. Although the room itself is very cozy; the door to the adjoining room is not at all sound proof. We would easily her the family next to us; even though they were talking in normal tones. Furthermore this being the second bedroom does not have all the amenities of the main one. We realised the problem when the lights went out; and we found out that it was because the people next door had removed their key card when they left the room. If only the management had clearly let us know all this before we had to argue it out.They did give us the room we had asked for late at night. The room unfortunately was not prepared; and it was nearly 12 am by the time it was all ready. This ruining what would have been a perfect holiday.I still give it 2 stars ( since there is no 2.5) because of the service and the food from room service. The view from the room as expected was great. Note that this is one of the windiest places I have been to. The whistling and howling of the wind at night is enough to keep one awake. Tata sky in the room was a bonus. The spa was also good; although a bit overpriced.There is ample parking; well equipped gym; pool; game room and tennis courts. Overall this is actually a very well equipped property with great views. Some of the rooms could be refurbished. If not for the fact that we did not get the room we paid for up front; I rate this lowly. That being said I would love to come back here again; just worried that I may not get what is committed.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Many thanks for sharing your experience. We have thoroughly reviewed your feedback and feel that we owe you our deepest apologies. Due to forces of nature; (heavy rains and strong winds) which was not under our control. We were not able to provide the room you had actually booked. We assure you that you will not have to face these issues again on your next visit. We value the feedback of our guests and appreciate your overall good review about our property. Looking forward to welcoming you soon.Best Regards;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: We stayed in Ravine for 3 days as a couple from 16th July. The resort is very well maintained and has amazingly beautiful view of the valley. Location: The location is the best part of the resort; situated right next to the Sydney point; it offers an amazing view of the valley and Krishna river. Surrounded with mountains and and clouds you are left mesmerized with the natural beauty that the place offers.Rooms: We stayed in the Jr executive room (220). The room was beautiful and spacious. It offered an excellent view of the valley form the front window and a nice view of Sydney point from the side window. The windows were full wall sized windows so the view was amazing. Due to very heavy rainfall there was little water leaking through the windows which was taken care by the staff by blocking it with towels. We would recommend this room for the excellent double-sided view it has to offer.Food: At ravine they do not have any complimentary breakfast or tea; neither do the have meal packages; which is quite disappointing as all major hotels nowadays offer meal packages. Anyways; we had all our meals at the restaurant and we liked it. The food tasted good and the quantity was also good. The prices are reasonable; neither too high nor is it cheap. The service at the restaurant is what was amazing; wonderful staff and you're always served with a smile.Service: The staff at the reception is professional and friendly; the staff at the restaurant is amazing. The room service on the other hand was not up to the mark; was terrible slow in one case when we had to call up 4 times for them to change linen and clean up the room. It was off-season so they don't have a lot of staff working at this time of the year.Cab Service:The hotel has a tie-up with cab service provider 'Amol' . We had booked their cab for sightseeing as well as for pickup drop from Pune. The service is terrible; the guy just changed plans on his own misguided us on a number of occasions. This was the only reason we give this resort 4 star otherwise it definitely deserves a 5 star.Value for money: The resort in the off-season on weekdays is a steal. Even on weekends it is quite cheap. They charge extra for the A/C which is fine. But if they offered buffet meal packages it would be amazing. Overall we had great fun; the resort is amazing and panchgani/ mahabaleshwar is wonderful place to visit in the rainy season as it is so beautiful at this time of the year.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Jr Executive room at the far right (220) is amazing as it offers full valley view in front at full S...

Review_Content: superb holiday stay at Ravine. The hotel is amazing and views are to kill for. Taking the rooms facing the valley ( Valley Facing or Valley Plus ) is like you are in heaven itself. The nights are amazing as the villages below are all lit up and you can see all the cars going towards mahableshwer n back. Just walking down in the gardens with the fogs and the wind almost sweeping you off your feet...total one of a kind. You can get ready to pluck strawberries; blueberries; figs in the hotel gardens itself...not that its allowed ;-) their serenity spa is amazing. so in love with the hotel that I have come almost 7 times to panchgani and never bothered to go to any other hotel...just love their ambience; the rooms; the views.... just dont bother with their restaurant...its not worth it..otherwise A class...u find quite a filmi crowd there...just book in advance specially weekends...there is no off seasons at all ..
Room_Tips: Room Tip: do choose the valley facing rooms...amazing with the fogs...specially when it all clears up...the vi...

Review_Content: We booked two four-persons ground floor rooms. Both were duplex and each one was very comfortable. Premium room is more spacious and luxurious. This place has multiple tennis courts and play zones. Even if you do not opt for view room I think that's still value for money because the cafeteria location compensates for all. View from cafeteria and other common/ open areas are no less than visiting other view points. Cafeteria foods are also good both quantity and quality wise. Overall we had pleasant experience.

Review_Content: The Ravine hotel is perched atop a ravine from where you can get an excellent view of the river and village down below. The rooms had a large picturesque window from where you could get a complete view. I visited during the rains and we could see the clouds going past us as we stood outside . They also have good arrangements for outdoor camping that you could use after the rains. Service was excellent and the staff very co-operative.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Select the room facing the valley
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; Thank you for your appreciative comments on Trip Advisor. It was a pleasure having you stay with us and we look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you back again!! Best Regards;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: Recently we had stayed at Ravines. We initially booked at Queens Tent and stayed there for one night. Tent is not suitable for families and lacks the facilities; though it might be good for bachelors or groups needing privacy. the next day we shifted to main hotel; thanks the the manager Mr Rathod; who was really very helpful. The rooms in the hotel are very good with a fantastic view of the valley below. The restaurant serves very good quality of food. We really did enjoy our stay here. Also the Spa here is very good; go in for a full body massage; really revitalizing.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Choose a room in the Main Hotel facing the valley

Review_Content: The view from our valley side room was just so amazing. they have an entire wall size window which opens up to the view of 2 tennis courts and the beautiful valley. i have a 1.5 yrs old son who thoroughly enjoyed the play area for kids. definitely one of the best in and around mumbai. room service was very good. a request for a special meal for our son was executed well. It was a wonderful stay overall. Expensive but worth it.

Review_Title: “Trip to Mahabaleshwar not complete without stay at Ravine Hotel!!!”
Review_Content: My family and me visited Ravine Hotel in the Month of June; start of monsoon. The hotel has a beautiful view of the valley and location. Rooms are very spacious and clean. We hunted for the similar kind of resorts in the vicinity of Mahabaleshwar but the rates were too high and not worth paying. The room tariff were very reasonable and service was good. I would suggest for this hotel if you are planning for short trip to Mahabaleshwar and Panchagani.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay in Panchgani. We are happy to know you enjoyed our location and your stay at the hotel. We look forward to your return visit.Kind Regards;Anish Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: One of the best locations. Called up the hotel to know if staying in Panchgani would be better then saying in Mahabaleshwarthe guy on the phone replied that he does not know about Mahabaleshwar.Booked it online as it seemed to be a good hotel. The hotel is located right next to panchgani toll gate. we opted for the valley side room and we were not disappointed ; The room offered excellent view of the valley.The room was fairly simple ; considering this is a budget hotel. But the huge window offering wonderful views was really a cherry on the cake.The hotel offers only snacks and beverages in room service. It seems that this is a family run hotel ; so the reception is not very efficient at times. The restaurant again has a nice view ; but very average food. Being a foodie ;I don't mind paying more for good food but the food here was below average at above average prices.Trying the restaurants at the nearby hotels is a better bet .Sydney point next to the hotel is at a walking distance and offers some stunning views .

We are looking forward to welcoming you again soon!!Kind Regards;Anish Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: This is one of the best hotel in Panchgani. The view from this hotel is awesome.The rooms;service;restaurants are also good.They offer some good range of spa which is really good.I will recommend to stay in upper floor rooms with valley facing view.Please make sure you book these rooms much in advance since they are high in demand.

Review_Title: “Very nice hotel with nice view from rooms.”
Review_Content: Best place to stay when your main objective is to stay within hotel premises for your trip. Rooms have beautiful view of valley. Service is very good. Cleanliness is exceptionally good. Other facilities such as gym;tennis courts ;spa;childrens play area are well maintained and very pleasant to use. Indoor games are also available such as table tennis; air hockey;carrom etc. There is plenty of outdoor open space to relax and enjoy the breeze and exotic view.The food also was good though there are no \hot\" drinks. Wii-fi is also available. Swimming pool is small and disappointing."
Room_Tips: Room Tip: \Choose the corner rooms with valley view for best experience."
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest; We are really glad to read that you were satisfied with our service and that you had a nice time. It was a pleasure for us having you as our guest!We look forward to welcoming you back to us soon.Kind Regards;AnishRavine Hotel

Review_Title: “The BEST Hotel in the BEST Budget”
Review_Content: It was our first wedding anniversary; therefore HAD to be special!!! And when it is Ravine... Nothing to worry about.We had a pre-booking and the entire amount was paid. While we were on our way to Panchgani; the hotel staff called to inform that the weather condition was bad and there was heavy rains; in case we wanted to cancel our booing! But we went ahead. Extremely well maintained. The hotel looks very good from outside. The rooms are excellent and this hotel has the best location in Mahabaleshwar-Panchgani. Rooms are very well maintained with spacious toilets. The room rates are worth the stay. The food is little expensive; but again worth the taste. They have an excellent spa and a theatre. The theatre can be booked at Rs200 per movie...so book the entire theatre and watch a movie cozily with your partner.We had booked Valley Plus room. However; since there were heavy rains; they had upgraded us to Superior rooms. We agreed to pay the extra rate of the room. However; when the bill came at the end of the trip; the extra rate was waived off completely! Also; a yumy cae was sent to our room on the day of our anniversary. It was on the house!Above all; this is the hotel where entire cast and crew of bollywood stays. The hotel is mostly booked by production units...so you can well understand the standards of the hotel. Infact; at the ground floor; there is one suite booked for Salman han. He always stays there. After my stay; I had suggested my friend to visit their; and you wont believe; opposite to her room stayed Shahrukh; deepika and rohit shetty...shooting Chennai Express!!Ravine is definitely a wannabe place with wonderful view; lovely service and great comfort. The best hotel...literally!
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Valley Plus Rooms at 2nd Floor
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for posting such a lovely review about our hotel. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and found the hotels location to be an advantage! We would be glad to assist you with your next booking soon. Kind Regards;Anish Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “Feedback on Hotel Ravine @ Panchgani - a Miserly and Incumbent 3 star hotel”
Review_Content: I am writing this feedback out of frustration from the experience that I had with Hotel Ravine @ Panchgani. After reviews from various sites; I got conflicting reviews on the Hotel. But then I decided to book deceipt by the online site and the images.  The online booking was done within a few minutes but even after 3 days I did not get any confirmation from them. I finally started calling them day after day; 8 times. But. Did not get any confirmation. It is only after threatening them with taking them to the court;I finally received the confirmation. Finally when we landed in the hotel expecting that the experience should be better than the booking experience. But we were in for a surprise; it started with the Travel desk. There was no-one at the travel desk and we had to wait for 30 minutes and still could not find anyone. After that the struggle started for getting the WiFi connection. I was given the User ID and Password; which got my wireless started; but it wa short lived. When enquired they told me that the wireless is complimentary only for the first hour and then it is chargeable. This was again something I could not digest; we stayed in a Non Star hotel but had 24*7  wireless free. An this was a 3 start property which did not have wireless free. I would have been fine with is but the checkin brochure that ideas given at the time of checkin did not have any such details. It was a diktat by the manager which had to be followed without any questions. On fighting and taking them to task I was given an alms of 2 hours of free Internet.There is more; the restaurant is exorbitantly overpriced; there is only on person taking the order and serving too and the quantity is anybody's guess.I wanted to write this so as to give the correct picture of my experience and to warn other users about the same. BE CAUTIOUS before you book your holidays here. Horrible experience!!!!!
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;We have thoroughly reviewed your feedback and feel that we owe you our deepest apologies for the inconvenience that you faced. We are very sorry to hear; your stay was not everything you expected. At Ravine; we are very serious about our customer's satisfaction & we work hard to get to the bottom of any customer complaints; we will try our best to rectify the problem and get them resolved. The hotel is actively working to improve service levels and your feedback has proved to be invaluable. We have taken this matter seriously and forwarded the same to the higher management. I hope we get the opportunity to host you back to Ravine again in the future.Kind Regards;Anish Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: Hii.. I stayed at Ravine in 2012 October. We went there for three nights and stayed in the valley facing rooms. It is a lovely hotel. The level of hygiene is excellent. The restaurant and room service is very good as well. The view and the location of the hotel is magnificent. We also spend an evening in the Spa. Although it is a little expensive; the service is really good. For a holiday and once in while occasion I would say the Spa is worth a try.I would highly recommend everyone to opt for Ravine! It is a truly beautiful hotel which gives you a worth for your money!
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Select the rooms on the upper floors and if possible the valley facing room. The view is beautiful a...
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you very much for your kind words. We are very happy to know; that you felt comfortable at our hotel.It is very important for us that our guest's experiences are shared. We hope you will return soon.Kind Regards;Anish Ravine Hotel

Review_Title: “Stunned with the location - facilities were below average”
Review_Content: I had been to Ravine hotel last September with my husband to celebrate marraige anniversary. I had done this booking without consulting husband. I was little skeptical over it since I have never visited this place. Location : The hotel is located at the beginning of Panchgani via Wai. So easily traceable. Just after you are stopped to collect the tourist tax. Sydney point is just besides this hotel.Room : I had booked Valley facing room. As soon as we entered - I was stunned to see the view from our huge window. Amazing pic from room :). River dividing the mountains around. The tranquility - what I felt was splendid! Room had nice wooden furniture. I felt the bathing section was little smaller in size. Since it was cooler and raining; hot water was another problem. We kept on following up with room service for hot water. At early morning hours; I saw whole big orange colored Moon. Stunning experience that will be vivid.Food : We went during the last day of Ganpati immersion hence the hotel was running short of staff. So first day - food serving was slow. Besides this day; the food serving was good. Food is good; tasty. No meal plans exists.Staff : We had checked-in 2 hrs late; so we asked a favor to check-out 1hr late. But staff was stern to say No. Though a kind Manager; Mr. Rathod apologized on staff's behalf later on. General staff was kind and helpful.Spa : The Spa experience was great. Stress reliever; hygienic; neat and good staff.Considering the hotel location I would rate between Average and Very Good.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Prefer Valley facing rooms.Do visit the spa.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Thank you for taking the time to review the Ravine Hotel.I am glad you found the hotel clean and you liked the location. We appreciate your valuable feedback and will take steps to ensure that you don't face issues like the ones mentioned. I hope you will give us the chance to show you just how warm the team here is; if you will visit again.Kind Regards;Anish Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: This Hotel is located on Entry Point of Panchgani; where government collects Tourism Tax for Panchgani. Hotel is on Sydney Point. Very good rear side of Hotel View. It has 4 Tennis Courts; so if you love playing then please carry required gears. But charges are 150 INR per Half an hour. This hotel is away from Main Market around 2 Kms; so personnel vehicle is must. Hotel has got Small Swimming Pool with poor change room facility; Best Gym; Indoor Games like Carom; TT; Chess; chargeable Table Hockey @ 20 INR per game; and some other coin based games....Food is very good in Hotel but there is no inclusive of food plan. Rooms are of 4 types; East Side (parking Side); Half Valley; Full Valley and Cottages. Suggest you to go for East Side as You can save money and valley view you can go any time on back side of hotel to enjoy... Hotel has got Spa and Salon facility also.Hotel is expensive; on the room charges there is 17% luxury tax and vat and sevice tax.... AC in rooms are costing additional of 600 INR per day.Overall Hotel is good if you are ready to spend.
Response_to_Review: Dear Guest;Many thanks for sharing your experience . We are obliged to have esteemed guest like you to stay with us. We very much value the feedback of our guests and we appreciate your overall good review about our property.Best Regards;Anish K.Ravine Hotel

Review_Content: We called the hotel to book our room but the person who answered was very rude and blunt. So; we called the booking office in Mumbai and our booking was done by Mr. Bharat who was very helpful and spoke very courteously unlike his counterpart from Panchgani. We wanted to book a Ground Floor Premium room but it was not available; so we opted for the Ground floor room. These rooms can accommodate a family of four. After driving down from Pune; we wanted to check in as soon as possible but they made us wait for ONE WHOLE HOUR. The ground floor room has absolutely no view except of the parking lot. The room was dimly lit and not very spacious. The room had absolutely no ventilation and it was suffocating. The bathroom was separated from the toilet and it was very inconvenient for the morning ablutions. The TV was really old and one could watch only limited channels. They do not offer complimentary breakfast which is very odd considering the high tariff. These days even budget hotels offer a tea/coffee maker; a newspaper; free Wi Fi; mineral water etc. but that is NOT the case with Hotel Ravine. They boast about the Bollywood stars that have stayed with them during a film shoot etc. but I guess it’s only the stars that get the 5 star pampering; the other guests have to fend for themselves. Since there was no ventilation; we opted to use the AC after paying an extra Rs.600/- (NOT inclusive of the room tariff of Rs. 5000/-) but it wouldn't work and they took hours to repair it. Finally; they replaced it with an AC from another room. We just had to bear with all the inconvenience.After two days & nights of torture; we shifted to the Ground Floor Premium Room which was like a breath of fresh air; compared to the previous room. It was well ventilated and there was no need for the AC; as strong cool winds blew from across the valley. The interiors of the room were good and it was very spacious with a very good view. The room service was good and so was the food. The swimming pool was dirty and a foul smell emanated from that area. Since; it is the only 3 star hotel in Panchgani; with an awesome view of the valley; the management is using it to their advantage. Kindly note that I have uploaded the images of the Ground Floor Room and the Ground Floor Premium Room.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Don't book the Ground Floor Room; it's claustrophobic and there is no view except for the pa...

Review_Content: Hotel ravine is property for family; for couples and its reallly one beauiful property....The view is amazing and you would have to choose between beautifuls spots to spend your evening...Food is ok. SPA is really good and authentic one.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Ground Premium room for 4 people - Family is really good with beautiful view

Review_Content: Wonderfull place with the most scenic view of Panchgani hills. This place is just at the start of Panchgani and has a wonderful persona of its own. With good clean rooms and with lovely scenic walk ways around; this places certainly relaxes your senses. Just a km from the market place which has restaurants and shops for local produce; its a good decision to be at Ravine. This place is also frequented by Bollywood personalities and sports personalities.
Room_Tips: Room Tip: Excellent stay option for Panchgani
